subjects.subject: English Language
subjects.quirk: No Section B choice - ALL questions compulsory

subjects.subject: English Literature
subjects.quirk: Section A has compulsory extract Qs; Section B has essay on texts (choose 1 of 2 per book)

subjects.subject: History and Civics
subjects.quirk: New from 2025: compulsory source-based map/document question in Section A

subjects.subject: Geography
subjects.quirk: Always includes compulsory 10-mark map-based question - pure Application level

subjects.subject: Mathematics
subjects.quirk: Paper set for 100 marks but evaluated out of 80; 6 questions in Section B, attempt any 4

subjects.subject: Science
subjects.quirk: THREE separate 90-minute papers: Physics (Sci 1), Chemistry (Sci 2), Biology (Sci 3) - not one combined paper

subjects.subject: Computer Applications
subjects.quirk: Group III subject: 50 marks Internal Assessment (majority of grade)

general_rules.section_a_coverage: Every chapter of the syllabus must appear in Section A
general_rules.section_b_no_repeat: No two questions in Section B can come from the same chapter
general_rules.class_9_included: Entire Class 9-10 syllabus is examinable - no 'only 10th' portion
